title: GDG DevFest 2017 Summary
brief: GDG DevFest Rift Valley '17 made even closer. Like any other #devfest, GDG DevFest Rift Valley will come in its own style tailored towards our communities' needs

title: GDG DevFest 2017 Announced
brief: GDG Moi | Kabarak | Egerton are super excited to announce the 1st Ever annual GDG DevFest 2017 which is the biggest Google related event in Kenya superbly crafted by GDG communities in the Rift Valley Region! The event will take place on **14.10.2017** in **Moi University,**  Main Campus - Eldoret.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest Rift Valley 2017 is HERE! The 1ST edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in Kenya's Rift Valley will take on **October 14** in Kenya's Moi University, Main Campus - Eldoret. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](#).
